subject: Stadiums and Arenas
Roofs
Snow and Snowstorms
lead_paragraph: The stadium known as Minnesota’s Rec Room, whose roof collapsed Dec. 12, has been used for a Super Bowl, college baseball, monster truck rallies, rollerblading, dog walking and model airplane flying.
snippet: The stadium known as Minnesota’s Rec Room, whose roof collapsed Dec. 12, has been used for a Super Bowl, college baseball, monster truck rallies, rollerblading, dog walking and model airplane flying.
